I am very disappointed. Another problem that bothered me about the show was its late start. Instead of starting at 19:30 pm, it started at 20:15 pm. I had a meeting straight after the show but I was late and made a fool of my selfmyself by arriving late and had to suffer all those people starringstaring at me and whispering.
